entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
